CPT Justification:
- 31629 (TBNA): Performed on the initial RUL mass (5 passes).
- 31628 (TBLB): Transbronchial biopsy performed on the separate LLL lesion (5 samples) in a different lobe.

- 31624 (BAL): Performed in the LLL superior segment (Note: Bundled if not distinct pathology, but performed for micro).
